Supported platforms: Windows XP and later; Windows Server 2003 and later
Auto defrag when idle: {{Yes|Yes, with Windows Task Scheduler}}{{efn|name=ScheduleIdle"|Windows Task Scheduler "Idle" schedules and options settings will be applied to scheduled tasks.}}"
